title: Silent Eye
sinopse: Makimura Airi is a very independent and strong top model. She falls in love with photographer Daiki, and through his influence, retires from the model world to pursue her new dream of becoming a great photographer herself. But immediately after she decides this, Daiki is asked to accompany a journalist to war-torn Chechnya, and suddenly goes missing...All Airi has now is his Nikon F5 camera that was recovered from the scene, but something is very strange about the camera. Could it be that Daiki is trying to communicate something to her through the camera's 17th frame? Another great suspense title from Akaishi Michiyo.
